跇字的基本解释

跇
yì
超越：“跇峦阬，超唐陂。”

跇字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yì］
［《廣韻》餘制切，去祭，以。］
［《廣韻》丑例切，去祭，徹。］
“紲2”的被通假字。
(1)超越；越过。
(2)用同“躞”。小步走。

跇字的康熙字典解释

【酉集中】【足字部】　跇； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页1222第36
【唐韻】餘制切【集韻】【韻會】以制切，?音曳。【說文】述也。【玉篇】超踰也。【廣韻】跳也。【前漢·揚雄傳】跇巒阬。【註】師古曰：跇，渡也。　又【廣韻】【集韻】?丑例切。同跩。或作跇。　又【集韻】時制切，音誓。義同。

跇字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
跇字的起名意思

指超越。

Transcendence: "Lianluanhua, surpass Tangbei."

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yì］
["Guangyun" more than cut, go to sacrifice, to. ]
["Guangyun" ugly case cut, go to sacrifice, thorough. ]
"绁2" was passed falsely.
(1) Transcend; cross.
(2) Use the same as "躞". Walk in small steps.

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Unitary Collection] [Foot Character Department] 　跇; Kangxi Strokes: 12; Page Number: Page 1222 36
[Tang Yun] Yu Zhiqi [Ji Yun] [Rhyme will] to make cutting,? Sound drag. 【Said Wen】Shu also. [Jade articles] Exceeding too. [Guang Yun] Jump also. 【Previous Han·Yang Xiong Biography】Lian Luanhua. [Note] Shigu said: 跇，來來也.　[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Ugly cut. Same lame. Or stumble.　[Jiyun] Time system cut, sound oath. The same meaning.
